meta.description: An open-source, cycle-accurate Nintendo multi-system emulator

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.long_description:
Higan (formerly bsnes) is a Nintendo multi-system emulator.
It currently supports the following systems:
  Famicom; Super Famicom;
  Game Boy; Game Boy Color; Game Boy Advance
higan also supports the following subsystems:
  Super Game Boy; BS-X Satellaview; Sufami Turbo
meta.name: higan

Higan (formerly bsnes) is a Nintendo multi-system emulator.

meta.name: higan

meta.description: An open-source, cycle-accurate Nintendo multi-system emulator

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.name: higan

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.long_description:
higan is a multi-system game console emulator. The purpose of higan is to
serve as hardware documentation in source code form: it is meant to be as
accurate and complete as possible, with code that is easy to read and
understand.

It currently supports the following systems:
- Famicom + Famicom Disk System
- Super Famicom + Super Game Boy
- Game Boy + Game Boy Color
- Game Boy Advance + Game Boy Player
- SG-1000 + SC-3000
- Master System + Game Gear
- Mega Drive + Mega CD
- PC Engine + SuperGrafx
- MSX + MSX2
- ColecoVision
- Neo Geo Pocket + Neo Geo Pocket Color
- WonderSwan + WonderSwan Color + SwanCrystal + Pocket Challenge V2
meta.name: higan
